title: Mass Effect: Andromeda - Super Deluxe Edition [1.09 + ALL DLCs]
description:
Release date: March 21, 2017
Genre: Action, Shooter, RPG, Open world, Third-person, 3D
Publisher: Electronic Arts
Languages: Russian, English, German, French, Italian, Spanish, Polish, Brazilian Portuguese
Audio: English

System requirements:
OS: Windows 7 and above (only 64 bits!)
Processor: Intel Core i5-3570 / AMD FX 6350 and better
Memory: 8 GB
Video: GeForce GTX 660 or better
DirectX: 11
Disk space: 48 GB (~ 85 GB for the time of repack installation)

DLC:
Pyzhak
Scavenger's armor
Appearance of a nomad
Deep Space Armor
Casual clothes "Pathfinder"
Elite weapon set for the Pathfinder
Exclusive helmet of the tracker "Elite helmet" Andromeda
Exclusive "Platinum" appearance of a nomad

Release info:
The repack is based on the ISO image Mass.Effect.Andromeda-CPY: cpy-mea.iso
Installed the update Mass.Effect.Andromeda.Update.v1.09-CODEX (3.7 GB) and missing in the patch CODEX files
100% Lossless and MD5 Perfect: all files after installation are identical to the original release with a bit precision (with the exception of deleted files)
Cut out French and German voiceovers, EXE trial version and bonus soundtrack in WAV format, NOTHING recoded
Significantly improved compression (from cumulative 54.9 to 29.7 GB)
After installation, the option to check the checksums of all files is available to make sure that the repack is installed correctly
Language changes in the game settings

How to install
1.Mount and install
2.Play

parsed.name: Mass Effect: Andromeda - Super Deluxe Edition [1.09   ALL DLCs]
